import { useEffect, useContext, useState } from 'react' import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { AppContext } from '../../context/context' import localforage from 'localforage' import { HiOutlineTrash, HiOutlinePlusCircle, HiOutlineHeart, HiHeart, HiOutlineViewGridAdd } from 'react-icons/hi' import SearchBar from '../SearchBar/SearchBar' import css from './NavBar.module.css' import ImgLogo from '../../assets/img/logo.png' export default NavBar => { const navigate = useNavigate() const [fav, setFav] = useState(0) const { addRandomCharacter, loading, clearAll, auth, updateAuth, characters, updateCharacters, toggleFavorites } = useContext(AppContext) useEffect(() => { const favs = characters.filter(e => e.favorite) setFav(favs.length) }, [characters]) const logout = () => { localforage.removeItem('user') .then(() => { updateAuth(null) navigate('/login') }) } return (
{auth && (
)}
); }
